title: Sovereign Power Profile Template
description: Defines a sovereign power (kingdom, empire, republic, etc.) including government type, leadership, population, territory, relationships, and identifiers. Government type is the first and most important decision. Every power needs distinct world view, symbols, and at least one ally and one enemy.
source_chapter: V2 Ch5 -- Creating a Sovereign Power

id.description: Unique identifier for this sovereign power (auto-generated)

name.description: Official name of the sovereign power (note: name may not match actual government type)

previous_governments.description: Previous government types in chronological order

founding_event.description: How this power was founded (conquest, treaty, revolution, divine right)

species_breakdown.description: Population breakdown by species with citizenship status

common_tongue_used.description: Whether a common tongue is used alongside official language

world_view.description: 2-3 driving ideological ideas that characterize this power (e.g., 'magic banned, military might valued, expansion cherished')

continent_id.description: Which continent this power is on

allies.description: Allied powers with reasons for alliance

enemies.description: Enemy powers with reasons for enmity

internal_conflicts.description: Internal conflicts (ethnic tension, resource disputes, succession crises)

symbol.description: National symbol and the impression it creates (aggressive, inclusive, etc.)

reputation.description: 2-3 key traits this power is known for (mad king, slave trade, naval superpower, unique products)

key_resources.description: Resources this power has and lacks

religions_practiced.description: Religions practiced in this sovereign power

who_really_rules.description: The real power behind the throne (shadow government, advisors, secret organizations, etc.)

history.description: Narrative history of this sovereign power

famous_for.description: What this sovereign power is most famous for

unique_places.description: Unique or notable places within this sovereign power

organizations.description: Organizations operating within this sovereign power

specific_accomplishments.description: Notable accomplishments of this sovereign power

inventions_and_discoveries.description: Inventions and discoveries originating from this sovereign power

places_built.description: Notable places built by this sovereign power

society.description: Overview of society structure and social dynamics

armed_forces.description: Armed forces of this sovereign power

important_characters.description: Important characters associated with this sovereign power

festivals_and_holidays.description: Notable festivals and holidays observed in this sovereign power

notable_buildings_establishments_guilds.description: Notable buildings, establishments, and guilds within this sovereign power

customs.description: Key cultural customs, especially greetings and expectations for visitors -- customs that cause misunderstanding between powers are most important

x-cross-references.continent-profile: This power occupies territory on a continent
x-cross-references.culture-profile: Cultures within this power are detailed in Culture Profiles
